### Business intelligence for the busy leader

If you're trying to get a handle on your business but are too busy to understand your own data, we can help. 

We create the margin you need so you can spend your time developing relationships, building strategy, and influencing decisions.

![](pexels-alex-andrews-1203808.jpg)

### Bandwidth you need for the important stuff

Do you have the bandwidth you need to remain a dependable leader?  Are you maintaining the right level of influence when you communicate with your people, your clients, or key stakeholders?  

Good presentation of your data story and business environment can make or break your leadership credibility. We can help you chart the right path forward by providing simple visualizations and reporting that fit your narrative.  

### Chart Better. Lead Better.

Hire us to develop business intelligence dashboards and reporting that help you monitor your business environment or integrate alongside a team already dedicated to this purpose. 

1.  Tell us what you're looking for.
2.  Onboard us with your team or securely collaborate through Google Drive, Microsoft Teams, or Github.
3.  Work with us part-time, asynchronously.

We are looking to help business leaders, expanding teams, entrepreneurs, small business owners, marketers, investment advisors, non-profit executives, public administrators, insurance professionals, researchers, influencers, etc.
